about_the_game:
Master Of Realms - The Ultimate RPG Map-Making Tool

Description:

Unleash your creativity with Master Of Realms, the revolutionary 3D Smart Hex Map Making Tool designed for tabletop RPG enthusiasts! Dive into the world of immersive map creation and elevate your gaming experience like never before. Master Of Realms allows you to craft stunning, hex-based RPG maps effortlessly, and you can even bring them to life in 3D or print them for your tabletop adventures.

Key Features:

1. Unparalleled Map-Making Power:

Pick a hex tile and start drawing on the grid, and watch as Master Of Realms transforms your vision into a breathtaking 3D map.

2. Diverse Map Elements:

Explore an extensive map-making toolbox equipped with Grid Selection Tools, Tile Draw Tools, Path Draw Tools, Eyedropper Tool, and more. Create anything from lush forests to bustling cities with ease.

3. 2D and 3D Export Options:

• Export your masterpieces in 2D for virtual tabletop platforms like 'FoundryVTT' or in 2D formats such as JPG, PNG, PDF, and even VTT. Choose your preferred grid overlay style (Hex or Square).


• Take your adventures to the next dimension with the upcoming 3D export feature, allowing you to 3D print your maps or explore them in a whole new way.

4. Streamlined User Experience:

• Save your progress effortlessly with the File Save System.
• Dive into map creation on your PC or Mac.
• Stay organized with in-app user authentication and activation (coming soon).
• Enhance your toolkit with in-app purchases (coming soon).

5. Perfect Your Maps:

The Edit Tool (coming soon) will give you precise control to tweak and refine every detail of your creation.

6. Community and Support:

• Join a vibrant community of RPG map makers and get inspired by their creations.
• Access comprehensive support resources to help you unleash your full map-making potential.
Get ready to become the ultimate Game Master with Master Of Realms! Create, share, and immerse yourself in epic RPG adventures like never before. Your tabletop world awaits – bring it to life with Master Of Realms.

(Note: Master Of Realms is currently in development, with features actively being implemented and optimized. Stay tuned for exciting updates!)

Minimum:
  • OS: windows 10
  • Processor: Core i5 5th Generation
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can run the application smoothly on medium graphic settings.
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: windows 11
  • Processor: Core i5 9th Generation
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: RTX 2060
  • DirectX: Version 12
  • Storage: 4 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: You can run the application with high-quality settings for an optimal experience.

short_description: Master of Realms is an smart mapmaking tool for both players and dungeon masters even world builder users, Simply pick a tile set, start drawing , and Master of Realms creates high-quality maps which you can 2D and 3D print (3D Printing), or use in your favorite VTT Application.
